data.name: Pre Board 1 for Classes X-XII CBSE and X_XI_XII CI commences Immerse and Inspire- AFS commences
Pre Board 1 for Classes X-XII CBSE and X_XI_XII CI concludes
Junior School Prize Giving and Cultural Programme
Annual Prize Giving Boarders of non-board classes leave for winter vacation after the conclusion of the function
Enrichment classes for board classes commence
ALUMNI CRICKET LEAGUE Great Indian Learning Festival
ALUMNI CRICKET LEAGUE Immerse and Inspire- AFS concludes
Boarders of board classes leave for winter break
House Staff (HMs, AHMs, and Dorm Parents) of senior boarding houses report to school
Boarders of board classes report by 8:00 pm
Second Pre-Boards commences for X and XII
Boarders of non-board classes report by 8:00 pm
Preboard exams for XII CBSE conclude
Class XII Board Practical exam commence
AIM for SEWA Fund raising programme in the Auditorium
Preboard for class X, XII CI and Annual Exams for Class XI CI concludes
